meanings.definition: A large, flightless bird native to South America.
meanings.sent1: Rheas are known for their inability to fly.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of rheas running across the grassy plains.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rhea refuse to join the flying competition?
meanings.sent4: In a world of soaring birds, rheas stand firmly grounded.
meanings.sent5: The sight of rheas sprinting across the field was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'rhea'.
meanings.sent1: There are many rheas in the zoo exhibit.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the rheas in the enclosure.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with drawings of colorful rheas.
meanings.sent4: Among the animals, rheas stood out with their unique appearance.
meanings.sent5: The plural form 'rheas' always reminds me of a lively group.
